9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir narrated:"The Prophet performed Raml from the (Black) Stone to the (Black) Stone for three (circuits), and he walked four (circuits)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّمَلِ مِنَ الْحَجَرِ إِلَى الْحَجَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Performing Raml From The (Black) Stone To The (Black) Stone
